scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Originally bound in an oversized photo-book album. This scrapbook centers on the activities and events related to the 35th Altrusa International Conference, held in Brighton, England. Contains materials related both to Altrusa and personal artifacts of the Altrusa club of Lexington members, such as baggage claim tags, postcards or flight itineraries. Also contains several maps or brochures related to local tourist or cultural locations.
